name: Chatdo - CHAT APPLICATION
description:
Chatdo is a social networking app that lets you send text messages to other users individually or in groups. Chatdo includes all of the features you'd expect from a modern messaging app, such as sending photos, sharing your location, searching for and sending GIFs, emojis, and stickers, making voice calls, video calls, and recording voice messages.

It also has a filtered contacts screen where the user can add only close friends or people with whom they frequently interact. The remaining contacts can be moved to a second screen that is also easily accessible and distinguishable. The user groups identified through research include youngsters, friends, couples, siblings, family and colleagues. So, by considering their needs and behavior, the product is designed to feel more intimate for the users rather than being professional.

Other features of Chatdo are sharing stories, Filter snaps, saving snaps, reminders, mood change notification, enabling screen passcodes, storing photos as albums, and more.
